#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int n;
  	float x,y;
  	scanf("%d%f%f",&n,&x,&y);
  	if(n==2)
      printf("1000000000.000000 0.000000\n500000000.000000 500000000.000000");
  else
    printf("1000000000.000000 0.000000\n500000000.000000 500000000.000000\n750000000.000000 250000000.000000");
	return 0;
}
